name: Shadows
content: Your body is the one thing I wanted
I felt it in my phone
在电话里我就能感觉到
I had to shake it off
我一定要摆脱这种感觉
我们什么时候才能独处
How did you get me up
That I could take the fall
And now I want it all
All your shadows in the dark that do
Run my fingers through your hair
穿过我指间，抚摸到你的秀发
All your shadows in the dark that do
Run my fingers through your hair
穿过我指间，抚摸到你的秀发
但我醒来时却独自一人
That I could take the fall
And now I want it all
All your shadows in the dark that do
Run my fingers through your hair
穿过我指间，抚摸到你的秀发
All your shadows in the dark that do
Run my fingers through your hair
穿过我指间，抚摸到你的秀发
They will never hold you like I do
And melt our shadows into one
Run my fingers through your hair
穿过我指间，抚摸到你的秀发
Run my fingers through your hair
穿过我指间，抚摸到你的秀发
